title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.4 - Sale, transfer restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.4 - Sale, transfer restricted

State Regulations

If a horse is claimed it shall not be sold or transferred
to anyone wholly or in part, except in a claiming race, for a period of 30 days
from date of claim, nor shall it, unless reclaimed, remain in the same stable
or under the control or management of its former owner or trainer for a like
period, nor shall it race elsewhere until after the close of the meeting at
which it was claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4230.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
